name: com.draconware-dev.span-extensions.net.unity
description: SpanExtensions.Net aims to make ReadOnlySpan<T> and Span<T> more accessible and overall better integrated into the .Net Ecosystem, by providing alternatives for many missing Extension Methods for Span<T>, ranging from string.Split() over Enumerable.Skip() and Enumerable.Take() to an improved ReadOnlySpan<T>.IndexOf().
